body_html: I don't think the pooling operations made the 0.9 cut, but they'll be available in the release that comes after 0.9. In the meantime, you can always [install from source].(https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#installing-from-sources)

body: I don't think the pooling operations made the 0.9 cut, but they'll be available in the release that comes after 0.9. In the meantime, you can always [install from source].(https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#installing-from-sources)
